name: Donner
description:
A game for the Global Game Jam 2018, where you give it to your partner in a song <3

I chose the diversifiers "Circles" (Graph made with circles mostly), "One clic" (per player) and "Stranger Things" (a music from the 80s)

But mostly, I did it for the lulz. 

Enjoy this piece of la variété française !
